subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT: ISAIAH WASHINGTON TELLS !
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm
Pt

SHOWBIZ SPECIAL EVENT: ISAIAH WASHINGTON
TELLS ALL!
   Tonight in an explosive one-hour Showbiz
Special Event,
Former Grey's Anatomy Isaiah Washington
opens up like never
before about what he says really
happened that led to him being
fired from one of TV's most
popular shows! 
   What's more, Isaiah vows that this rare
interview about the
gay slur he uttered heard 'round the
world will be the very
last time he speaks publicly about
the controversy! Isaiah
tells Showbiz Tonight's A.J. Hammer
"It was horrible. I'm
saddened and after today, I will shut
up....I'm not talking
about it ever again." 
	 About
how he felt after being fired, Isaiah chokes up and
says "I
felt like I had been humiliated, chastised, and put in
my
place." Isaiah also lashes out at former castmate T.R.
Knight, who went public with the fact that he was gay after
the
first reports about what Isaiah said. Says Isiah:"I
couldn't
believe that he tried to throw me under the bus
that way. This
man straight lied."
    And there's a
lot more.This is the interview everyone will
be talking
about. It's a Showbiz Special Event: Isaiah Tells
All! on TV's most provocative entertainment news show,
Showbiz Tonight. 11pm ET/PT on CNN Headline Prime.


SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY
Isaiah Washington: Did he deserve to be fired from Gey's
Anatomy?
